name: Vizabi
description: The open-source framework by Gapminder Foundation for creating maintainable charts and visualization tools. Embed Vizabi freely to your page, add your own data, or extend it to create new visualizations and modify existing ones.
solutions: Created the architecture sctructure of the tool
Updated visualization tools and BigData sets
outcome: BigData is a visualization tool that could be embedded in custom solutions to create new visualizations for users' needs.

technology_stack: AWS (EC2, ECR, ECS, ElasticCache, CloudFormation) to GCP migration
